Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created: 03.07.2001
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
02.02.2005 SH SCR7766 Added test to terminate BPH112, without any database
updates, if there exists no BTCH row
13.09.2004 SH SCR6997 Extended update of BPIV_PAYEMENTCODE with 0 if
BTCH_CODE = GNRL_BTCHIDMOVEDINVOICES
19.08.2004 SH SCR6737 Extended updates BPIV_PAYMENTCODE in task "Create/Modify
BPIV" (before always GNRL_PAYMCODPARTPAYMENT was used)
16.04.2004 SH SCR3627 Activated this version of BPH112 for the usage in our
- programs and renamed it from BPH112_COPYSH to BPH112
14.04.2004 SH SCR4412 Changed some remarks in program
22.12.2003 SH SCR5117 Added diff. updates to BPIV_PAYMENTCODE if the hole
- invoice amount has to be booked.
12.11.2003 SH SCR3627 Restructured BPH112 --> Could be used now to
- book partitial invoice amounts (PI.HANDLE_PART_INOICEAMOUNT = TRUE) and
- only if PI.BTCP_UPDATES =TRUE phys. upates to BTCP will be performed,
- otherwise only the BTCP parameters will be updated
07.11.2003 SH SCR4734 Extended update of BPIV_PAYMENTCODE
09.10.2002 SH BTPC_LINENO will be updated in the R.S. now not with INIT as befor
09.10.2002 SH Add new field BTPC_DEBC_NO, init with INVO_DEBC_NO
17.09.2002 SH BPH112 do not make updates to the BTCP row it will send the new
- values back to the caling program
06.08.2002 JJ SCR1840 added new parameter PI.BTPC_LINENO
07.03.2002 SH SCR958 new field BPIV_INVOICETYPE init with 1
20.02.2002 SH --> Fixed BUG if BTPC rows are storing, BTPC_LINENO =>
BTCP_BTPC_LASTLINENO, not with 1
SCR#838 20.02.2002 SH (Changed check INVO_FOREIGNAGENCY <> null in >0)
-- Virtuals uses if PI.HANDLE_PART_INOICEAMOUNT = TRUE
- Only performed if physical updates for BTCP allowed --> PI.BTCP_UPDATES = TRUE
-- Need to recalculation BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC, only relevant if
-- PI.HANDLE_PART_INOICEAMOUNT = TRUE
-- Onyl relevant if a partitial invoice amount has to be booked
-- Perform further handling only if the BTCH row exists
if new BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT is stored:
-- Special handling if phys. updates to BTCP allowed/not allowed
-- Special handling if phys. updates to BTCP allowed/not allowed
-- Handle the hole invoice amount
-- Handle a partitial invoice amount
- If the hole invoice amount has be handled
-- Updates to BPIV
-- Updates to BTPC
-- Updates to BTCP
- If a partial invoice amount has be handled
-- Write old BPIV amounts to virtuals, uses for calculation BTPC amounts
-- if the new values were written to BPIV
-- Updates to BPIV
-- Updates for BTPC, with the differences
-- Updates to BTCP
